shiny.gentelella 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Dashboard

Source: R/dashboard.R
Dashboard.Rd

An object that is meant to represent a standardized dashboard page layout with NavigationMenu, Settings, Summary and a customizable container for the main content section.
